change1: - Added: Restore the GUI window to the last-used position and size.
change2: - Added: The ability to change the prompt used for the Profile/Task analysis has been added.
change4: - Changed: Widened the GUI window slightly for better readability.
change5: - Changed: 'Specific Name' items are now available via a pulldown menu.  It is no longer necessary to enter the names through a text input box.
change7: - Fixed: The 'Reset' button in the GUI is not resetting the analysis model.
change8: - Fixed: If 'Get Local XML' is selected in the GUI, the analyze Profile and Task list is not updated.
change9: - Fixed: The 'Specific Name' tab has the label for the 'Colors' tab in the GUI.
change10: - Fixed: Under certain situations, the GUI will use the old data even after getting a new XML file.
